sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { addItem, minusItem, deleteItem } from './../../Redux/Slices/cartSlice' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' const CartItem = ({ imageUrl, price, sizeCount, title, types, id, typesCount }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const myObjofItems = useSelector((state) => state.cartSlice.items.find((obj) => obj.id === id)) const typeNames = ['тонкое', 'традиционное'] const blockMinus = myObjofItems.count > -1 ? true : false const sizeList = [26, 30, 40] function plusItem() { dispatch(addItem({ id })) } return (

{title}

{typeNames[typesCount]}, {sizeList[sizeCount]}

{blockMinus &&
dispatch(minusItem(id))} className="button button--outline button--circle cart__item-count-minus">
} {myObjofItems.count}
{price} ₽
dispatch(deleteItem(id))} className="button button--outline button--circle">
) } export default CartItem
